title: Mushroom and chicken liver pate
ingredients: ['15g butter', '450g chicken livers, trimmed and chopped', '250g mushrooms, chopped', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '100g fresh breadcrumbs, slightly moistened with water', '2 large egg yolks', '1 dessertspoon plain flour', '60ml milk', '60ml double cream', '3 tablespoons brandy', '75g butter']
